tools.name: Get-EmptyGPOs
tools.description: Finds Group Policy Objects with no settings configured.

IncludeDisabledSections.description:
Also report GPOs where a configuration section (Computer or User) is disabled
but still has settings configured. These settings are dormant and may indicate
a misconfiguration.

tools.name: Get-GPOPermissionReport
tools.description: Audits Group Policy Object permissions for common security and application issues.

IncludeDefaultPermissions.description:
Also include GPOs with standard/healthy permissions in the output. By default,
only GPOs with issues are returned.

tools.name: Get-StaleGPOs
tools.description: Finds Group Policy Objects that have not been modified within a given threshold.

IncludeLinked.description:
Include stale GPOs that are still linked to OUs. By default, only stale GPOs
that are also unlinked are returned.

DaysStale.description:
Number of days since last modification to consider a GPO stale. Must be between
30 and 3650. Default is 365.

tools.name: Get-UnlinkedGPOs
tools.description: Finds Group Policy Objects that are not linked to any OU, site, or domain.

tools.name: Invoke-GPOHealthAudit
tools.description: Runs a comprehensive Group Policy health audit and generates an HTML dashboard.

OutputPath.description:
Directory where the HTML report will be written. The file is named
GPO-HealthAudit_<domain>_<date>.html. Defaults to the current directory.

DaysStale.description:
Number of days since last modification to flag a GPO as stale. Must be between
30 and 3650. Default is 365.

IncludeDisabled.description: Include GPOs with disabled-but-configured sections in the Empty GPOs check.
